dct_title_s: [Map of the Holy Land, showing the route of the Israelites, from Levush ha-Orah]
dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Illustrations of ships, structures, and settlements throughout.
Shows topography, drainage, travel routes (of the Israelites on their way to the Holy Land), and places of historical interest.
Descriptive text within, above, and below map.
From Jaffe's Levush ha-orah : beʼur ʻal Rash''y sheʻal ha-torah. Prague : 1603.
